title: Timer Testing
description: Test debounce and throttle functions using fake timers to control time without waiting for real delays.
instructions: Complete the test suite by using fake timers to test time-dependent functions. Use the provided advanceTime function to simulate the passage of time and verify the debounce and throttle behaviors work correctly.

hints.text: Use advanceTime(ms) to simulate time passing - this triggers any timers that are ready to execute
For debounce, call the debounced function multiple times before advancing time past the delay
